name: patchwork-electron
description: Electron wrapper for Patchwork: run as a desktop app outside the browser

scripts.postinstall: cd app && npm install && cd .. && npm run rebuild

releases.name: Patchwork 2.12.4
releases.body:
- fix crashing (see https://github.com/pull-stream/pull-ws-server/pull/18)

Welcome newbies! :heart:

Here's another 100-use invite code for @mixmix's pub, hit the "join pub" button, and paste this in:

```
pub.mixmix.io:8008:@uRECWB4KIeKoNMis2UYWyB2aQPvWmS3OePQvBj2zClg=.ed25519~OzuqGsk3HX9d2p7FzKelkMFQmWgjN5ft28KfgLGaJj4=
```

releases.name: Patchwork 2.12.3
releases.body:
- use improved persistent gossip

WINDOWS BUILD! 🎉 💥 

Here's a 100-use invite code for @mixmix's pub, hit the "join pub" button, and paste this in:
`pub.mixmix.io:8008:@uRECWB4KIeKoNMis2UYWyB2aQPvWmS3OePQvBj2zClg=.ed25519~1oc9n5VVI8CrdVZR4er10BRoiOKbbsYWX0NSZ92sjjc=`

releases.name: Patchwork 2.12.0
releases.body:
- fix painfully slow startup times
- only connect to pubs that you follow on open (instead of everyone), then slowly try connecting to everyone else over the next few minutes

releases.name: Patchwork 2.11.0
releases.body:
- performance improvements on replication
- now supports pubs running on tor

releases.name: Patchwork 2.10.3
releases.body:
- fix display of "Digs on your posts" menu item
- stop sidenav from overlapping content when window is too small
- increase default width to fit interface properly on load

**macOS:**
- allow clicking dock icon to reopen main window

- upgrade to electron v1.1.3
- improved performance when loading long threads
- upgrade to latest scuttlebot

releases.name: ssb-patchwork-electron
releases.body:
# Patchwork 2.7.0 released

Changes: 
- The unread count is now in the favicon
- Inbox now shows all recipients' avatars.
- In-progress message drafts will now persist, if you cancel or navigate away from the composer.
- Search is now much faster
- New follows and unfollows now show in the Digs view, which is now just "Notices," instead of in your Inbox.
- Users will now show up in the search autocomplete (but not in the results).
- Code-views now overflow scroll horizontally instead of line-wrapping
- The "Activity Feed" is now the home screen, instead of the inbox
- Messages in the feed no longer expand when you click a link within them
- Other small fixes and updates

[Full changeset](https://github.com/ssbc/patchwork/compare/a4569a99fe3d8e479437472d8e8dfaef2bc1...master)
